alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Mecklenburg; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CABARRUS...EAST CENTRAL MECKLENBURG AND SOUTHEASTERN ROWAN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Salisbury to 6 miles southwest of Downtown Concord to 7 miles southwest of Huntersville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Downtown Concord, Harrisburg, Spencer, Granite Quarry, Rockwell, Mt Pleasant, Faith, Reedy Creek Park, and Midland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
